Popular Flowers.Name: Rose
Popular Flowers.Description: Often called the 'Queen of Flowers', roses are known for their velvety petals and intoxicating scent.

Popular Flowers.Name: Tulip
Popular Flowers.Description: These cheerful blooms herald the arrival of spring with their cup-shaped petals and vibrant hues.

Popular Flowers.Name: Sunflower
Popular Flowers.Description: With their large, sunny faces, sunflowers bring a touch of warmth and happiness wherever they bloom. These towering plants are known for their ability to track the sun across the sky.

Popular Flowers.Name: Orchid
Popular Flowers.Description: Orchids are prized for their exotic beauty and intricate blooms. These delicate flowers come in a vast array of colors, shapes, and sizes.

Popular Flowers.Name: Lily
Popular Flowers.Description: Lilies are elegant flowers with a sweet fragrance. Their meaning varies depending on their color.

Popular Flowers.Name: Carnation
Popular Flowers.Description: Carnations are versatile flowers that come in a wide range of colors, making them suitable for various occasions. They are known for their long vase life and ruffled petals.

Popular Flowers.Name: Daisy
Popular Flowers.Description: These cheerful blooms with their bright yellow centers and white petals evoke feelings of innocence and purity.

Popular Flowers.Name: Hydrangea
Popular Flowers.Description: Hydrangeas are beloved for their large, showy clusters of blooms that change color depending on the soil pH.
